timeline.bodyText:
Please explain on a subsequent line where the counts come from. It helps to explain to users how counting happens so they grasp the check easier.
Example: X, Y, and Z are counted as 1 each which gives the total of 3. A, B, and C are ignored which don't add to the score.
I would even consider adding counting to non-violations to show it is below the threshold.

timeline.bodyText:
1 space after all comments, it makes them easier to read.

(&,|)

I would not use parenthesis or commas as it could be confused with the actual parenthesis in the code. You can use the technical name for the operators or stick with & and | but again, space them apart so they aren't so compact. The comment can span multiple lines if needed.

total complexity of 3(max allowed 3)

Again, space between words and (.
